title: A Bear for Thanksgiving
description: My family doesn’t want me.They’re prioritizing my brother’s wife again. She hates my guts, and I don’t know why.On top of that, I broke up with my boyfriend. However, I met a handsome stranger in my favorite bar. Tall, muscled, with a gentle, magnetic smile.He’s more than just a man, though.I found out not too long into knowing him that he’s a bear shifter.He turns into a bear to protect me from his ex.I’m being introduced to a world I’ve never known, with a man I could easily fall in love with.And I’ve been invited to his family’s thanksgiving.Author's This is a steamy stand alone with a HEA. It is intended for 18+
author: Lisa Daniels
